Review: Not a bad selection of bets. What I do find annoying is that if you win a bet you have to log out and then log back in to show winnings. Please just have a refresh button instead. I also know of a few friends who get the winning spin thing. I haven't had it in 3 years, hence why I choose skybet asy preferred betting platform. This one definitely lags behind many others.

I never really rate apps but I felt like I had to for this one. Long story short, the app is very very bad. It takes a few minutes to actually load up (that's if it decides its going to load up as most of the time I get stuck on the loading screen) If I actually get into the app, usually it won't let me past the log in screen as it gets stuck there often and when I just want to cash out a bet, this can be very frustrating. The biggest issue is definitely the loading times, they're horrific

App runs VERY slow, and constantly hangs up mid bet, sometimes I'm unsure if a bet has even been put on. And before you say it, I've already cleared the cache and data, restarted my device, and reinstalled the app. It makes no difference. Why should I have to comtact you with the details of the issues, when it's all written here? Sort it out or I'm going elsewhere.

Virtually unusable since a pointless update. Ridiculously long time to open, if it does open at all, constantly asked to log in, then told my details are wrong or I'm not allowed to open it because of my location. (London)? Random navigation, the back button rarely takes you back to the previous page. All in all, was a great app, but due to some pointless tinkering it's now utter rubbish. We'll done everyone.

Why is the app so slow? It's got so many good things going for it. Visually it's nice, the layouts easy to navigate and understand. You get all your freebie bets and any promotions. Everything works great. Except. It doesn't matter what device you're on, it doesn't matter if you use dial up, wireless broadband or your mobile data..... Its just sooooo slow. I've never, ever experienced a slower app. It could easily be a 5 star but its so slow that if I could give it only half a star I would.

Terrible app. Keeps closing down if you switch between apps and when it does you lose your being slip. Updated to 2 stars. Since the update the app was fine for about a week. Now I get ' cannot connect to server' or ' bet slip not available' around 6 times a week. Also on the new bet filter for horse betting it doesn't show thre odds (it used to). Have uninstalled/ installed twice with no change.

So frustrating when trying to research and build your acca! If you're looking at another website and you change screens back to the Ladbroke app, it refreshes the coupon list you're on, always going back to the top. Very frustrating if you've worked most of your your way down the list. Also a few times, it crashes whilst refreshing so have to close the app and lose all of the bets you've put on your slip. Took about 6 attempts to build a 15 team acca!

Enjoying good odds and benefits but none of the casino games work (I just got through to a jackpot and it crashed). It took me a month to be able to access the free spins despite contacting customer service. Have had multiple problems with 5 aside. Have also had problems logging in when it doesn't accept my password. All this on 3 different devices and browsers. The app needs a lot of work.

Awful. It doesn't work if I'm on home WiFi, is painfully slow to respond (if it doesn't freeze and doesn't respond at all). I've used programs on a ZX81 which are more user friendly. Why I've tolerated it for so long is anyone's guess. But definitely when my latest lot of credits get used I will leave for another betting app which can't possibly be worse.

Had enough of this now. Put up with it for the last two years, so slow, repeated freezing. Really really REALLY BAD APP. moving to someone else for this season. Contacted by Ladbrokes to say contact them about this. What is the point? I have stated here the issues. To see the issues, try the virgin app. Not for betting value etc, just for speed and functionality . Compare the two. That should explain it for you.

The app is really slow. Sometimes even crashes whilst using a broadband connection. Constantly freezes and that makes the whole experience awful. It's a shame because the odd boost and fast withdrawal are a plus, however the whole app experience is bad in my opinion. Also takes some time for the balance to be updated tho the bet was settled. And your response is to try and log out and reinstall the app? Even on a new device and WiFi the app is appalling.

May be it's me but this app is worthy of a score of 70 out of 100. We should talk about the good things really it easy to navigate it has a quick response. and holds up to most of their competitors . on the other hand unfortunately I find it irritating when it freezes when watching virtual live football. and more so when your going through the cards betting show and as you pick the next race or later it suddenly goes back to the first. race. the only ways is reload the app. .

Dreadful app. In the month I've used it, there have been "technical issues" which have suspended all games stopping me from cashing out and having to use other sources to check scores. Both times I've contacted them and its been well after the final whistle and all they can say is "sorry for the inconvenience". Both times this has happened its been on a Saturday afternoon, possibly the busiest time in the UK for betting on football. Would not recommend.

App works well and quickly. I like how the free bets I get credited show in the box at the top of the screen where my account is. Layout is clean and navigation is some to work through to the areas I visit most. I have noticed occasionally that the score updates are not applied - recently a score changed three times and the app never showed that the time had moved on in the games from around the 20th minute. Bet won but it could have been an issue if I had been unable to cash out... More recently I am finding the app will not refresh the page showing my bets. If I miss a cashout I would be very annoyed. Tried on 2 very modern phones but it happens on both so must be a Ladbrokes programme error.

I joined for the knockout promotion. When I registered it gave no 
indication that I had deposited any money and said the promo code was 
invalid so I hit deposit again. I now have more money in the account than I 
originally wanted. Tried using the webchat but gave up. Not very user 
friendly and now no way to get my promotion.

Unbelievably terrible to use. After an unbearably long process to register 
and add funds, I placed a bet on the tour de france. Now, with one day left 
and my bet a sure thing, I look at how I will cash in when the time comes, 
only to see no trace of my bet!! I am utterly gutted at how this could have 
happend. App will be immediately deleted.

Not the best app I have used. Pretty slow and cumbersome to use. The cash 
out function is particularly slow, half the time I try to cash out it takes 
10 seconds plus and by that point the odds have changed. I feel that is 
almost deliberate to stop people cashing out later in the game.

Signed up as there was an offer I liked the sound of. Didn't get applied as 
it timed out in the time it took me to go upstairs and find my debit card. 
Tried the online chat to try and discuss why sign up offer wasn't applied, 
they kept telling me code wasn't entered and I didn't deposit, explained it 
timed me out so I couldn't complete sign up. They kept telling me I didn't 
enter the code and then ended the chat to get rid of me. I have screenshots 
of the chats, worst customer service I have ever experienced. Betting apps 
are highly competitive and they dont value the customer at all in the first 
5 minutes of joining, I'll keep my business with somebody who will listen 
to me

In short, for Android you need to utilise material design since its become 
standard and there are so many new apis. Technology evolves utilise or be 
left behind and currently you are behind. If you want I can send over 
suggestions for the improvement of the interface and more.

This app and there customer service is sit.... i bet in a game reverside vs devonport was showing the game 0-1 odds 4/9 on 75minuts the game keep going until 100 minuts and still 0-1 and i realise somthing going rong i took screenshot ass a proof the system fail big time! And after there website crash out and was 1 day close , It was giving no realistic results i make a big complain asking to refun my money back they didn't do anything next day when they fix it i open the application in setaled bets the game was 12-1 not trastful app

So many problems I don't know where to start. It often freezes, it doesn't 
like you spending to long on it & it has unique ways of getting you to come 
off of it & log back in. When placing a bet it quite often goes crazy with 
cursor jumping around like a demented flea making it impossible to place 
bet though sometimes you can press refresh which helps....sometimes. It has 
been good, bad & indifferent over the time i've used it at the moment it is 
bad but that doesn't mean it will always be like that...I hope.

What a scam lol. You HAVE to set a daily, weekly or monthly minimum amount

nothing but to motivate people to become a gambler! You should be able to 
bet ONE time only! And Google should really review this app, I'm pretty 
sure they don't want to be part of something that can destroy someone!
It constantly crashes and leaves you unable to cash out on in game bets. It's practically theft. Use bet 365 never had problems with them.

Terrible for acca's! Constantly lose links to games which suspends cash out

The worst betting app I've ever used. And I've used them all.  Sure it might have a few nice feature. But that sacrifices speed, it is the slowest app I've used since the iPhone 3gs  As well as it being slow it has serious security flaws.   When I first signed up it told me my password was wrong. So I tried to reset my password but i didn't get an email for a whole day. So I tried to resend the email, still no luck. So then I presumed it had failed when creating the account.   So I proceeded to create another account but my username was taken and my mobile number, however I could use my email again. Very strange. Then it told me my password was wrong again. Hmm  I then pressed the back button on Google chrome app and boom it logged me in. Very strange indeed. I then deposit money and try to put a bet on. Logged me out after taking money.  So I ring up and they take off one of the accounts and manually reset my password. Everything is working but I didn't get my promotional free bets. So I contact them and they said "oh yeah they didn't work blah blah. I'll put them on tomorrow."  I check every day still no free bets. Then I contact them again. This time the chat disconnected me so I had to type it all out again. So I started typing this big essay about how bad it has been. Then the guy said you are taking too long and disconnected me again.   Then finally I managed to explain to someone and he just said you have already had your promotional free bets and told me there was nothing he could do.  Wow.
